This game has many different mods on it for you to try, such as jailbreak, bhop, zombie escape, deathrun, and minigames. It's like gmod (cause it runs on the source engine with gmod) but gmod is different. Gmod is made to customize, and this game... its not. It's made as a simple hostage rescuer or bomb planter/defuser simulator, WITH GUNS :P You should buy it and you can see I have TONS of experience playing the game. Tip: activate console and bind keys to make hotkeys. (like to say your lr (jailbreak) or to access a menu (admin menu for say) and it will make things go faster). Use bind (key) "command;othercommand(to do next)" and you can bind a key to do two things!

Jeder Gamer sollte das Spiel eigentlich kennen weil es einfach so ein einfaches aber geniales Ego-shooter Spiel ist! Ich spiele es schon mehr als 1000  Stunden und  spiele es trozdem noch fast täglich! Es hat nicht mehr die Aktuelleste Grafik aber das interessiert hier keinen, weil es hier mehr um die Taktik des Spieles geht. :)  Außerdem findet man noch andere Spielmodis außer Classik, wie z.B. Surf, Jail oder Minigames deswegen verliert man nie den Spielespaß! Wer Counter Strike; Source nocht nicht hat sollte es sich jetzt trozdem noch kaufen egal, wann du diesen Beitrag hier liest!

It's a classic for a reason. One of the earliest multiplayer FPS games. People have been playing Counter Strike for a long time, and that makes it extremely challenging.

If you like being "pwned" constantly then Counter Strike is your game. It is a great time and one of the perfect LAN party games. One of the games that I play at every LAN party, sometimes with MODs and sometimes without.

If you like First Person Shooters and you have a group of friends looking for a game, then you should be playing Counter Strike.
